name: Simple256
summary: Simple color scheme for using with light background
description:
This is a simple color scheme for using with light background and 256/88 colors terminal.
Screenshot:  http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5235/screenshotvimrcvimtq1.png .
install_details:
Copy script to ~/.vim/colors and add to your .vimrc following lines:
if $TERM == "xterm"
    set t_Co = 256
    colors simple256
endif
